provenance.description: License decided by scraping the resource at http://www.plosone.org/article/info%3Adoi%2F10.1371%2Fjournal.pone.0035089 and looking for the following license statement: "This is an open-access article distributed under the terms of the free Open Government License, which permits unrestricted use, distribution and reproduction in any medium, provided the original author and source are credited.".
